mapper.select:
with a as (select case when ALARM_NAME='一级低压脱离告警' then '退服' when ALARM_NAME='交流输入停电告警' then '停电' when ALARM_NAME='温度过高' then '高温' when ALARM_NAME='烟雾告警' then '烟雾' when ALARM_NAME='水浸告警' then '水浸' else ALARM_NAME end alarm_name, count(a.ALARM_NAME) amount from v_alarm_message_management a where 1=1
and a.STATION_SECURITY_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{stationSecurityLevel}),'%')
and a.BELONG_OPERATOR like concat(concat('%',#{belongOperator}),'%')
and a.BIZ_SCENE like concat(concat('%',#{bizScene}),'%')
group by a.ALARM_NAME ) select b.name item,nvl(a.amount,0) amount from ALARM_NAME b left join a on b.name = a.alarm_name

with a as (select case when ALARM_NAME='一级低压脱离告警' then '退服' when ALARM_NAME='交流输入停电告警' then '停电' when ALARM_NAME='温度过高' then '高温' when ALARM_NAME='烟雾告警' then '烟雾' when ALARM_NAME='水浸告警' then '水浸' else ALARM_NAME end alarm_name, count(a.ALARM_NAME) amount from v_alarm_message_management a where 1=1
and a.STATION_SECURITY_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{stationSecurityLevel}),'%')
and a.BELONG_OPERATOR like concat(concat('%',#{belongOperator}),'%')
and a.BIZ_SCENE like concat(concat('%',#{bizScene}),'%')
group by a.ALARM_NAME ), a2 as ( select count(*) counts from station_address_management t where 1=1
and t.station_safe_lv like concat(concat('%',#{stationSecurityLevel}),'%')
and t.operator_name like concat(concat('%',#{belongOperator}),'%')
and t.biz_scene like concat(concat('%',#{bizScene}),'%')
) select b.name item,nvl(a.amount,0) amount, decode(a2.counts,0,0,round(nvl(a.amount,0)/a2.counts * 100,2)) amount_rate from a2,ALARM_NAME b left join a on b.name = a.alarm_name
